channel.title: 3.0 Machining & Fabrication on FRC Zero
channel.description: Recent content in 3.0 Machining & Fabrication on FRC Zero

item.title: 3.1 What is Machining & Fabrication?
item.description: What is Machining? Machining is the process of cutting, shaping, and finishing materials using a machine. In FRC machining is used to create parts for the robot. This can be done using a CNC machine, a 3D printer, or a manual mill or lathe. There are many different types of these machines, and each has its own advantages and disadvantages. This section will cover the basics of machining and how to use some standard machines.
